key_modifications: Defined ConsultantTypeResponse model with UUID id, name fields (English and Hebrew), and timestamps
Added Config class with from_attributes=True for ORM compatibility

patterns_discovered.description: Response schemas follow a consistent pattern with Config.from_attributes=True to enable direct ORM object conversion
patterns_discovered.implications: Enables seamless conversion from database models to API response objects

patterns_discovered.description: Schemas include both English (name) and Hebrew (name_he) fields for internationalization
patterns_discovered.implications: Application supports dual-language content at the data model level

patterns_discovered.description: All response schemas include created_at and updated_at timestamp fields
patterns_discovered.implications: Enables audit trails and temporal tracking of resource changes

gotchas_discovered.description: Schema uses UUID type without explicit verification that it's imported from the uuid module
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify uuid import exists in file header

gotchas_discovered.description: Schema uses datetime type without explicit verification that it's imported
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify datetime import exists in file header

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Direct schema definition following established patterns in the codebase
approach_outcome.execution_efficiency: Single attempt successful with no revisions required
approach_outcome.alignment_with_codebase: High - follows existing schema conventions and structural patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that all required imports (UUID, datetime, BaseModel) are present at the top of the file
recommendations.rationale: Code references UUID and datetime types which must be imported for the schema to function

recommendations.recommendation: Review naming convention - ConsultantType suggests consultant consultant_type may be a better class name if representing a consultant type entity
recommendations.rationale: Clarity in naming conventions aids maintainability

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding docstrings to the ConsultantTypeResponse class documenting the purpose and field meanings
recommendations.rationale: Improves API documentation and developer understanding

recommendations.recommendation: Add unit tests validating ConsultantTypeResponse schema validation and ORM conversion
recommendations.rationale: Ensures schema behaves correctly with various input scenarios
